title: Tjukken & Lillemor
overview: The leisurely life enthusiast Truls Svendsen has agreed to join adventurer Cecilie Skog on crossing Greenland on skis. It will be a 600 kilometer long ski trip that will require thorough preparation, willpower and a solid friendship.Truls Svendsen and Cecilie Skog will try to climb the highest mountain outside the Himalayas, Aconcagua. This will be the toughest trip Truls has ever embarked on and for experienced adventurer Cecilie it will also be a real challenge.
